page.title: 06Binley Industrial Estate
page.content: The Heron Way Industrial Estate is mainly concerned with light industries such as engineering, chemicals, glass, and food packing. There is a large sports equipment store, a photographers,and a vehicle spare parts shop. Most are trade only, but some are open to the public.More units are to built in the near future.Most employ between 10 and 30 people. Very few employees, only 20 are related to children at our school, St.Bartholomews. We expected more, as it seemed a potential source of local employment. Noise levels are minimal but the amount of traffic entering and leaving the estate has had some effect on all the residents. There is no pollution problem and the estate is pleasantly laid out and shielded from sight by a high grassy bank.
